about_the_game:
Habilis is a sinister-dark, 45 minute, first-person bodycam-style, Lovecraft horror game by the developer of Mother Hub.

You are an aspiring young content creator named Nathan Walters who would do anything to find fame. Once you step foot inside an old abandoned facility you face terrors and incomprehensible horror, but will it take everything from you, even your own mind?

GAME FEATURES

  • Explore beautifully rendered science fiction style facility in the near future.
  • A handcrafted tale of one man’s descent into insanity and extreme sickness.
  • All dialogue voice acted by an all star cast of professionals.
  • Incredible, and unique music shaped to fit every scene
  • A short but sweet 45 minutes of non stop entertainment.
  • An adventure that isn’t for the weak of heart.

SURVIVE THE UNKNOWN

  • An immersive adventure as Nathan Walters who would do anything for fame.
  • Try to survive as Nathan’s surroundings destroy his body, and mind.
  • Hope that you might be able to escape unrelenting evils.
  • Experience a new take on the found footage / back rooms genre combined.

ESCAPE THE T.R.P. FACILITY

  • Sneak, crawl, and pray that you don’t get caught.
  • Only your flashlight, and your will to survive.
  • Consult your tablet for clues to solve puzzles, as well as listen to audio logs.
  • Tread carefully as the facility literally falls apart around you.

content_descriptors.notes:
There is some mutilated bodies.
There is some mild language such as F and S.

name: Habilis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent

short_description: A first person / body cam, Lovecraft style horror experience not for the weak of heart. Descend into the T.R.P Facility while evading monsters by hide in lockers, and discover over 30 minutes of professionally recorded audio logs.
